entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 12] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper, “Semantic Segmentation of UAV Images based on Transformer Framework with Context Information,” has been accepted in Mathematics (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.592, Top 6.1%).
entry.summary: [2022. 12] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper, “Semantic Segmentation of UAV Images based on Transformer Framework with Context Information,” has been accepted in Mathematics (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.592, Top 6.1%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 12] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “Adaptive Backward/Forward Sweep for Solving Power Flow of Islanded Microgrids,” has been accepted in Energies (SCI, JCR-IF: 3.252, Q3).
entry.summary: [2022. 12] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “Adaptive Backward/Forward Sweep for Solving Power Flow of Islanded Microgrids,” has been accepted in Energies (SCI, JCR-IF: 3.252, Q3).

entry.title: News
entry.summary: [2022. 12] Congratulations! Hye-Seong received an 우수논문상 in KSC 2022.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 11] Congratulations! Hye-Seong’s paper, “의미론적 영상분할을 위한 강화된 엔트로피 비지도학습 도메인 적용 방법” has been accepted in KSC 2022.
entry.summary: [2022. 11] Congratulations! Hye-Seong’s paper, “의미론적 영상분할을 위한 강화된 엔트로피 비지도학습 도메인 적용 방법” has been accepted in KSC 2022.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 11] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “Adaptive Margin-based Contrastive Network for Generalized Zero-Shot Learning,” has been accepted in ICCE 2023.
entry.summary: [2022. 11] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “Adaptive Margin-based Contrastive Network for Generalized Zero-Shot Learning,” has been accepted in ICCE 2023.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 11] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper, “Encoder-Decoder based Segmentation Model for UAV Street Scene Images,” has been accepted in ICCE 2023.
entry.summary: [2022. 11] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper, “Encoder-Decoder based Segmentation Model for UAV Street Scene Images,” has been accepted in ICCE 2023.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 09] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “Zero-Shot 이미지 분류를 위한 Transferable Contrastive Network에 관한 연구” has been accepted in KAIC 2022.
entry.summary: [2022. 09] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “Zero-Shot 이미지 분류를 위한 Transferable Contrastive Network에 관한 연구” has been accepted in KAIC 2022.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 03] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Human Interaction Recognition Framework based on Interacting Body Part Attention,” has been accepted for publication in Pattern Recognition (SCI, JCR-IF: 7.740, Top 7.1%).
entry.summary: [2022. 03] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Human Interaction Recognition Framework based on Interacting Body Part Attention,” has been accepted for publication in Pattern Recognition (SCI, JCR-IF: 7.740, Top 7.1%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2022. 03] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Joint semantic understanding with multi-level branch for driving perception,” has been accepted for publication in Applied Sciences (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.679, Q2).
entry.summary: [2022. 03] Congratulations! Prof. Lee’s paper, “Joint semantic understanding with multi-level branch for driving perception,” has been accepted for publication in Applied Sciences (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.679, Q2).
